Lightning Talk: Brainplus Expression Template Parser Combinator C++ Library: A User Experience - Braden Ganetsky - CppCon 2024
---

I'm always thinking about the user experience. And this is certainly a user experience. Brainplus is an expression template parser combinator c++ library using minimal syntax. It uses "plus" and "+", and that's a plus!
---

Sponsored by JetBrains: https://www.jetbrains.com/clion/
---

Braden Ganetsky

Braden Ganetsky graduated from the University of Manitoba with a degree in mechanical engineering, but soon pivoted to C++. He developed a passion for parser combinators, and he spends his free time getting involved in the C++ community.
---
